data.description: Mark up Perl packages easier with CGI::Kwiki
data.similar: Extends CGI::Kwiki::Formatter, which comes with CGI::Kwiki
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
The author of CGI::Kwiki (INGY) built a framework that allows
    people to extend his modules very easily. In the docs, he encourages
    people to upload extensions to CGI::Kwiki to CPAN.
